name: Cathartic Cartography!
description:
Created for the September 2022 RPI game jam!

The world is constantly shifting, and cartographers are in high demand! Can you map out the rapidly shifting terrain in time? CAN YOU PAY YOUR RENT?!?!?!

Other features maybe added later in the future kinda

Any issues? Drop them in the forum.

Source Code: https://github.com/abrookst/TerraIncognitaGameJam
